Utilities

Provides general functions like makeTimeStamp or remove

Summary
UtilitiesProvides general functions like makeTimeStamp or remove
Functions
makeTimeStampCreates timestamp (time in µs) from tcpdump timestring
makeTimeCreates string with hour, min, sec, µsec from timestamp like time in tcpdump
removeRemoves all items of a list from another list
getTimeReturns actual time as string
getTimeStampReturns actual time as timestamp
getResultFilesReturns alls result files for a topology file
getSimulationDirectoryLooks for simulation directories for a vigen topology file

Functions

makeTimeStamp

sub makeTimeStamp

Creates timestamp (time in µs) from tcpdump timestring

PARAMETERS

$timestringstring with time from tcpdump

RETURNS

timestamp in µs from 0:00 o’clock that day

makeTime

sub makeTime

Creates string with hour, min, sec, µsec from timestamp like time in tcpdump

PARAMETERS

$timestamptimestamp generated with makeTimeStamp

RETURNS

human readable timestring

remove

sub remove

Removes all items of a list from another list

PARAMETERS

$listReferencereference of list where items should be removed from
$deleteListReferencereference of list with items that should be removed from $netRef

RETURNS

list with removed items

getTime

sub getTime

Returns actual time as string

getTimeStamp

sub getTimeStamp

Returns actual time as timestamp

getResultFiles

sub getResultFiles

Returns alls result files for a topology file

getSimulationDirectory

sub getSimulationDirectory

Looks for simulation directories for a vigen topology file

PARAMETERS

$topologyFiletopology file object

RETURNS

topologyNamestring with name of topology
baseDirectorydirectory where topology file is located list of simulation directories
